item.description:
Do you like to dance to the sounds of the 60s Rock & Roll , 70s Motown, 80s pop rock
This will be a great way to start the Memorial Day Weekend, Great band, great music, great people!!
Meet up table having fun, have dinner and dance the night away
at 8:30 pm, band starts at 9:30 -1, cover charge but it is worth it -- check out the website
http://www.shoproduct...
see you there
Nancy
item.how_to_find_us: Meet up table having fun at 8:30pm, band starts at 9:30 -1, cover charge but it is worth it

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Memorial weekend fun with music and dancing
